ygData.subject: Changing email address
ygData.msgSnippet: To unsubscribe or to subscribe, just send an email to which ever you need to the following address: Subscribe: EverQuest-subscribe@yahoogroups.com Unsubscribe:
ygData.messageBody:
To unsubscribe or to subscribe, just send an email to which ever you need to
the following address:

Subscribe: EverQuest-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
Unsubscribe: EverQuest-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com


-----Original Message-----
From: Nymue Ce'Nedra [SMTP:nymue_uberdruid@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 19, 2001 7:52 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] OT: Changing email address


Anyone know how I can get list email sent to a
different email address? Yahoo groups doesn't seem to
want to send list mail to anyone who doesn't have a
yahoo email address .. If the list owner reads this
can you please send an invite email to nymue@...

Thanks,
Nymue

=====
Nymue Ce'Nedra
Wood Elf Druid, Cazic-Thule Server
